TopicTitle: Twitch Thursday: Ariedien.showing us to have fun!

Articles.Content: <figure data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92" class="tmblr-full"><img src="https://41.media.tumblr.com/041caa78de6e28c0c93aa7e30fac66cd/tumblr_inline_nso96iWPUS1rr2wit_540.jpg" alt="image" data-orig-width="480" data-orig-height="92"/></figure><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/swflibs/TwitchPlayer.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="620"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/swflibs/TwitchPlayer.swf"></object><br/><a href="http://www.twitch.tv/ariedien" style="padding:2px 0px 4px; display:block; width: 320px; font-weight:normal; font-size:10px; text-decoration:underline;">Watch live video from Ariedien on Twitch</a><p>Ariedien’s Twitch channel is a fun .and relaxed place to hang out and watch some live Kerbal Space Program..He streams several times per week, from 8AM PST onwards!</p>
